review: Recently received this product for Christmas, and was eagerly anticipating using it with all of the movies I had been watching prior to it's release, including Captain America, The Avengers, a couple versions of Iron Man, Thor, etc.,etc. Unfortunately, the film vault dried up, with almost none of the films I had recently watched via Amazon Prime through the computer as available to watch on the TV. I feel ripped off. I have no desire to slog through the back of grade B and C movie catalogs to waste months watching sub-par films. I would have thought that the number of films available would have increased with this new product release. Hopefully I'm wrong and the movies will gradually return.
